name: Alduin
description: The World-Eater, the ancient dragon who destroyed the world in the Dragon War and was later resurrected by Daedric forces. Alduin is the most powerful of all dragons and the main antagonist of the main quest.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23660000%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3Eüêâ%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Daedric Dremora
description: A fearsome Dremora warrior summoned from the planes of Oblivion. These demonic beings are equipped with daedric weaponry and radiate magical power.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23662200%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3Eüëø%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Frostbite Spider
description: A giant ice-infused spider found in the depths of Blackreach. Highly venomous and capable of firing freezing venom projectiles.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%2300ccff%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3Eüï∑Ô∏è%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Ancient Dragon
description: One of the oldest and most powerful dragons still living in Skyrim. Ancient dragons are significantly more dangerous than their younger kin, with powerful magic and devastating breath attacks.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23333333%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3Eüêâ%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Vampire Lord
description: A powerful vampire in their lord form with shapeshifting abilities, increased durability, and devastating melee and magic attacks. Vampire Lords are feared predators of the night.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23330000%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3Eü¶á%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Frost Atronach
description: An elemental construct of pure frost magic. These creatures are immune to frost attacks and deal devastating cold damage to their enemies.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%2300ffff%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3E‚ùÑÔ∏è%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Sabre Cat
description: A large predatory feline with prominent saber-like teeth. These aggressive hunters are found throughout Skyrim and pose a significant threat to unprepared adventurers.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23cc8822%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3EüêØ%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Deathlord
description: The most powerful form of draugr, these ancient Nordic warriors have risen from their slumber. They command powerful Thu'um and wield enchanted weapons.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23444444%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3EüíÄ%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Storm Atronach
description: An elemental construct of storm and lightning. These powerful beings are immune to shock attacks and can unleash devastating lightning upon their foes.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23ffff00%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3E‚ö°%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Daedric Sphere
description: A mechanical sphere of pure Daedric design. These constructs fire lethal spikes and are surprisingly mobile despite their heavy armor.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23554433%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3E‚öôÔ∏è%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E
